name: Guest House Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: The Guest House - Vickie Johnson
reviews.text: Great bang for the buck: unbeatable for $50. US! Wonderful service and breakfast.

aka: Guest House Bed And Breakfast By Vicki Johnson Hotel
description: The Guest House is a restored Victorian Bed & Breakfast in the historic district of Puerto Varas. Also known as the Casa Kortman, we offer a cozy home away from home.Two blocks from the iconic Parroquial Church, and three blocks from downtown Puerto Varas. We offer 10 bedrooms with private baths, delightfully comfortable beds, personalized attention in a relaxed atmosphere. Our services include our famous breakfast. We also offer airport transfers, 24 hour a day free wifi, private parking, laundry, car rentals, tour services, as well as travel advice and maps.
